name: PROJETO RJ
description:
Fight crime through the streets of Rio de Janeiro,Brazil. A rich city known fot its natural beauty where crime really pays off.
Take down factions, investigate schemes, dismantle gangs and grow as a law enforcer in this trial version of the project.

The story from a policeman's point of view will be present only in these test versions of the project so that the story of the final product is preserved.

This is an early access core mechanics are still in development but the build is very stable and playable  at the moment :D

An open-world singleplayer being REGULARLY UPDATED FOR THE LAST 4 MONTHS

If you want to follow the project updates
